Reviews.Title: “Contemporaneo Rooms - an excellent place to stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Irina Z
Reviews.Content: locationwise excellent literally 5 minutes walking distance termini station walking distance main attractions 20minute walk colosseum spanish steps 25 minutes walking distance wont list close time catch bus vatican city vatican museum clean bathroom littel bigger clean looked owner extremely friendly rome 23 till 26 august hot heaven inside airconditioned breakfast excellent cant recommend highly real value money

HotelInfo.Name: Contemporaneo Rooms
HotelInfo.Address: Via dell'Esquilino 38, 00185 Rome, Italy
